mapper.select: SELECT o.id orderId, m.`name` memberName, ma.`consignee_name` consigneeName, o.`total_price` totalPrice, o.`post_price` postPrice, o.payment payment, o.`status` orderStatus, pm.`name` paymentWay, o.`creat_time` createTime, s.`name` skuName, oi.`sku_id` skuId, s.`description` skuDescription, oi.`nums` num, ma.`specific_address` consigneeAddress, ma.`phone` phone, m.account account FROM `order` o JOIN ( member m, member_address ma, payment_method pm, order_item oi, sku s ) ON o.member_id = m.id AND o.member_address_id = ma.id AND o.payment_way_id = pm.id AND o.id = oi.order_id AND s.id = oi.sku_id

SELECT o.id orderId, m.`name` memberName, ma.`consignee_name` consigneeName, o.`total_price` totalPrice, o.`post_price` postPrice, o.payment payment, o.`status` orderStatus, pm.`name` paymentWay, o.`creat_time` createTime, s.`name` skuName, oi.`sku_id` skuId, s.`description` skuDescription, oi.`nums` num, ma.`specific_address` consigneeAddress, ma.`phone` phone, m.account account FROM `order` o JOIN ( member m, member_address ma, payment_method pm, order_item oi, sku s ) ON o.member_id = m.id AND o.member_address_id = ma.id AND o.payment_way_id = pm.id AND o.id = oi.order_id AND s.id = oi.sku_id where o.`id` = #{id}
